title: Women Mid Waisted Cargo Jeans Flap Pocket Straight Wide Leg Casual Baggy Boyfriend Denim Streetwear Pants
description: Size Guide: Available in S, M, L, and XL. Sizes are equivalent to US sizes (S=4-6, M=8-10, L=12-14, XL=14-16). Refer to our size chart for a perfect fit. Please note that measurements may have a 0.5-1 inch variance due to manual measurement.

Unique Design: Featuring a classic utility style with multi-pocket functionality, these pants come with a drawstring cuff and meticulous seam detailing. The loose fit and three-dimensional tailoring enhance your silhouette while providing ample freedom of movement.
Premium Fabric: Crafted from high-quality, durable fabric, these cargo pants offer both comfort and longevity, making them perfect for everyday wear and tear.

Style & Versatility: Perfect for casual streetwear, these cargo pants can be paired effortlessly with crop tops, hoodies, or oversized tees. Ideal for various occasions like urban adventures, outdoor activities, or just a relaxed day out.
Care Instructions: Machine washable for easy care. To maintain fabric quality, do not dry clean. Simply wash with like colors and tumble dry on low.
